```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)

```

##Load in the FAS litters data

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv('./data/FAS_litters.csv')
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

## `selcet`
Choose some columns and not others

```{r}
select(litters_df, group, gd0_weight:gd_of_birth)
```

```{r}
select(litters_df, -litter_number)
```

Renaming columns...
```{r}
select(litters_df, GROUP = group, LitterNumber = litter_number)
```

```{r}
rename(litters_df, GROUP = group, LitterNumber = litter_number)
```

Select helers

```{r}
select(litters_df, starts_with('gd'))
```

```{r}
select(litters_df, litter_number, everything())  #move''litter_number' to the begining and keep everything else
```

```{r}
relocate(litters_df, litter_number) #relocate the litter_number to the begining
```

##filter
```{r}
filter(litters_df, gd0_weight  < 22)
```

```{r}
filter(litters_df, gd0_weight  >= 22)
```

```{r}
filter(litters_df, gd_of_birth == 20)
```

```{r}
filter(litters_df, gd_of_birth != 20)
```

```{r}
filter(litters_df, gd0_weight >= 20, gd_of_birth == 20)

```

```{r}
filter(litters_df, group == 'Mod8')
```

```{r}
filter(litters_df, group %in% c('Con7', 'Mod8')) #group is equal to either Con7 or Mod8
```

##`mutate`

```{r}
mutate(
  litters_df, 
  wt_gain = gd18_weight - gd0_weight,
  group = str_to_lower(group))
```


##`arrange`

```{r}
arrange(litters_df, pups_born_alive)
```
